long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bailingual Translate is a high-quality manual translation for a certain platform. Its users are divided into two types: translators and users. Translators can use the extension to perform real-time, visual translation on the platform. Users use the extension to see high-quality manual translation. In addition, we also provide feedback function for users, which can provide feedback on any unclear content of the platform.
